EmailTemplate.name: Document Generation Request QA Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Document Generation Request QA Approval - Employer Name: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Employer_Type_Email__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
DGR {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Name} for {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.DBA__c}, {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Employer_Type_Email__c} has been approved by the BPA QA team.
Thank you.
